LanguageData.RE_BioticEnergyMax.label: biotic energy limit
LanguageData.RE_BioticEnergyMax.description: The maximum amount of biotic energy the individual can sustain safely.
LanguageData.RE_BioticEnergyRecoveryRate.label: biotic energy recovery rate
LanguageData.RE_BioticEnergyRecoveryRate.description: The rate at which this person recovers biotic energy.
LanguageData.RE_BioticAbilityCostMultiplier.label: biotic ability cost multiplier
LanguageData.RE_BioticAbilityCostMultiplier.descripti: How much effort it costs to use biotic energy.
LanguageData.RE_AbilityCooldownFactor.label: ability cooldown factor
